news.title: MI5 neo-Nazi spy: Judge had 'no confidence' in Security Service's account of false evidence
news.summary: Judge's concerns came ahead of High Court hearing to decide next steps about false evidence.

news.title: Failing water sector needs stronger regulation, review says
news.summary: The Water Commission finds "deep-rooted, systemic and interlocking failures" in the water industry.

news.title: UK threatens to sue Abramovich over Chelsea sale
news.summary: The proceeds have been frozen since the UK government forced the club's sale following Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

news.title: 'The abuse was almost daily' - Grooming survivors share their stories
news.summary: Five women from across England who were abused as children or young adults have told BBC Newsnight about the ongoing impact it has had on their lives.

news.title: UN calls for investigation into killings near Gaza aid distribution site
news.summary: Antonio Guterres says he is "appalled" by reports of Palestinians being killed and injured while seeking aid in Gaza.

news.title: The Papers: Britain 'battle-ready' and 'new Maddie search'
news.summary: PM Sir Keir Starmer announces new military spending and police look again for Madeleine McCann.

news.title: More then 3,000 shows announced for Edinburgh Fringe
news.summary: Comedy, music, magic and cabaret will all be part of the arts festival, which runs from August 1 to 25.

news.title: Disney makes hundreds more layoffs as it cuts costs
news.summary: The media giant has been under pressure as viewers move away from cable TV to streaming platforms.

news.summary: The proceeds have been frozen since the UK government forced the club's sale following Russia's invasion of Ukraine.

news.title: 'I'm not scared' - Malaysia hero's courage to play again after acid attack
news.summary: Malaysia and Selangor FC footballer Faisal Halim on returning to the national team for the Asian Cup qualifiers following a life-changing acid attack.
